item.title: About
item.description:
ğŸ‘‹ Ground control to my friends!

My name is Jiayu Chen, and Iâ€™m from Xiamen, China. Now I’m a research assistant in Uppsala University with a passion for the development of novel molecular technologies in the realm of biomedical engineering.

Iâ€™m particularly interested in:

  • Single-cell and spatial multi-omics
  • Exploratory analysis

Outside of the lab, I enjoy running, music, reading, and hiking.

Feel free to contact me!

Education
